column4: Hi there! i HAVE big problems with my AMD64 on laptop. It's too warm!!! Some know how-to undervolting in ubuntu???? THNX
I don't know anything about passing "undervoltage" instructions to the kernel, but you might look and see if your proc supports freq. scaling.
make sure laptop-mode-tools is installed as well. thats about the only generic (non ibm or non dell0 package I could find relating to laptops.
